title: Federated Edge Learning-Based Data Privacy Protection Technology

context.prior_knowledge: Basic machine learning concepts and foundational knowledge of communication systems
context.additional_context: Course focusing on in-service professionals acquiring skills to perform model training on edge devices while ensuring data privacy. Conducted through online asynchronous learning in environments with provided digital devices

learning_goals: Learners can explain the fundamental principles of the FEEL framework and data privacy protection mechanisms.
Learners can analyze digital broadband aggregation methods to resolve multi-access channel issues in wireless communication environments.
Learners can implement the 1-bit quantization and QAM modulation processes of the OBDA technique using simulation tools.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
